paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Mean age 40.8 years, both male and female participants
patients.phenotype: Hereditary ATTR amyloidosis (ATTRv) with varying degrees of neuropathy

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Amyloid was detected in skin biopsies of 76 of 88 (86%) individuals with ATTRv.

individual_records.phenotype_details: No clinical signs of neuropathy, Coutinho stage 0
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Thirteen individuals had no symptoms on any of the questionnaires and had a normal physical examination and were Coutinho stage 0.

functional_data.summary: Amyloid deposition correlates with neuropathy symptoms.

variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the early detection of amyloid deposition in ATTRv patients.
key_quotes: Amyloid was detected in skin biopsies of 76 of 88 (86%) individuals with ATTRv.
Thirteen individuals had no symptoms on any of the questionnaires and had a normal physical examination and were Coutinho stage 0.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene was extracted successfully.
